title: GLPI
author: Vitetj
description: GLPI is a powerful open-source IT Asset Management, IT Service Management and helpdesk solution. Manage your IT infrastructure, track assets, handle tickets and incidents with comprehensive ITIL workflows.
postInstallMessage:
✅ GLPI is initializing automatically!

The database setup runs in the background (30-60 seconds).
The app is ready to use immediately.

Default credentials:
  Username: glpi
  Password: glpi

⚠️ Change the default password after first login.

LDAP Integration:
If LDAP is enabled, users are automatically synchronized.
You can log in with your Cloudron credentials.

Persistent Data:
All data is stored in /app/data and backed up automatically.

Troubleshooting:
To reinitialize: cloudron exec rm -f /app/data/config/config_db.php && cloudron restart

Documentation: https://glpi-user-documentation.readthedocs.io/
